name: Pending Rejection Out To Customer
query:
SELECT
A.name as "Rejection In ID :Link/Stock Entry:150",
A.posting_date as "Date:Date:80",
A.selco_supplier_or_customer as "Supplier Or Customer:Link/DocType:80",
B.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:80",
B.item_name as "Item Name:Data:100",
B.qty as "In Qty:Int:60",
B.reference_rej_in_or_rej_quantity as "Out Qty:Int:60",
B.qty - B.reference_rej_in_or_rej_quantity as "Pending Qty:Int:100"
from `tabStock Entry` A  JOIN`tabStock Entry Detail` B ON A.name = B.parent AND A.selco_branch = %(selco_branch)s AND  A.selco_type_of_stock_entry
IN("Rejection In") AND A.selco_supplier_or_customer IN("Customer") AND ifnull(B.qty,0)-ifnull(B.reference_rej_in_or_rej_quantity,0) > 0 ;
